content: Our sponsorship reflects our values and dedication to positively impacting our community.”The Kidney Walk embodies what Team Care represents: compassion, commitment, and community. Their participation shows that care extends beyond the clinic, continuing through every step, every memory, and every act of hope. title: Leading with Care: DCC & KCC's Kidney Walk Journey
